text: The Humans may refer to: *The Humans (comic), a comic published as a spiritual successor to the Planet of the Apes series * The Humans (video game), a 1992 puzzle platforming video game * The Humans (play), a Tony-award-winning Broadway play * The Humans (UK band), a UK/American rock band founded in 2007 * The Humans (New York band), an American 1960s garage rock band * The Humans (Romanian band), a Romanian pop rock band founded in 2017 *The Humans, a 2013 novel by Matt Haig
title: The Humans
